ygData.subject: RE: Magical Gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes Bard HTH is capped at (lvl+1)*3.  Also I have heard that it maxes at 100. Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server Master Brewer of Societus Argenti Amerginn -
ygData.messageBody:
Yes Bard HTH is capped at (lvl+1)*3. Also I have heard that it maxes at
100.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server

>From: "Michael W. Steele" <wvrk_jock@...>
>I may be mistaken but I have elf-hide gloves and cannot punch a wisp for
>damage.
>So magic gloves are not the cure to punching magic critters.
>BTW at 19 my H2H is maxed and it still sucks. Might have something to do
>with only getting 3/level. I hear a lot of people say bards get 4 per or 5
>per. Trust me... We get 3.
>
>Michael Steele
>WVRK Columbus, ROCK 103
>Cumulus Broadcasting, Inc
>Columbus, GA
